changelog.text:
§g[04.04.23]§f
* Added FlowPanel to display children controls inline
* Updated WindowPanel control, not it has WindowBar that allows to move the window
* Added dialogue system
* Added scrolling with ScrollViewer

§g[08.04.23]§f
* Added functioning spellbook and spellbar
* Added sprites for entities
* Added Healthbars on top of enemies
